text: Very attractive! I'd put the contact details at the top on the green bit in line with the name. Design-wise it might not work as well but its easier to check you out. I'd also avoid the 'meter' approach to software skills. It annoys some recruiters because its unhelpful. Just list the programs in order of expertise. I'd also change the word 'ideating' as its not a common term "making people's ideas come to life" maybe? Are you going for this one? <https://jobs.blue-zoo.co.uk/vacancy/details/158/visual-development-artist-internship/>
Ah yes, I was going back and forth on the meter thing as well! Thank you for clarifying that, I'll change it right away.  Yes, making ideas come to life does sound more Animation forward!

Yeah, the blue zoo internship would be ideal for me since they have spaces for visual development and background design internships as well! I'm gonna begin the application journey through The Line Animation. I'm just adding finishing touches to my reel for that. I'll be able to share it with you soon!
